about_the_game:
Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled, heart-pounding experience like no other in Rune Rampage! Step into the shoes of a skilled and agile warrior, ready to embark on a thrilling journey through dynamic and challenging environments.

In this single-player, fast-paced movement game, the objective is clear: compete to achieve the fastest times on a variety of meticulously designed maps. With each successful run, your times will be proudly displayed on the global leaderboards, showcasing your skills to the world. The pursuit of perfection and the desire to be at the top will drive your every move.

Rune Rampage revolves around a unique and exhilarating set of movement mechanics. As a player, you'll master the art of kicking, utilizing it to knock down doors and propel yourself off walls with breathtaking speed. The seamless combination of kicking and wall running allows for fluid, acrobatic maneuvers, giving you an edge as you navigate through complex obstacle courses.

Immerse yourself in a world that pushes the boundaries of your agility, reflexes, and strategic thinking. Each map presents a distinct challenge, with meticulously placed obstacles and strategic routes, demanding split-second decisions to maintain your momentum and shave off precious seconds from your time. Experiment with different paths, discover hidden shortcuts and uncover the most efficient routes to outperform your rivals.

Are you ready to embark on this unparalleled quest for speed, precision, and glory? Brace yourself for the ultimate Rune Rampage experience and leave your mark as a true champion of the leaderboard!
detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Singleplayer / Storymode
  • Global Leaderboards
  • Rankings
  • Ghosts, See the top-ranked players run with you (in progress)
  • Map Editor (in progress)

name: RuneRampage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and newer.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and newer
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Experience unparalleled speed and precision in RuneRampage! Master dynamic movement mechanics, tackle challenging maps, and compete for the fastest times on global leaderboards. Are you ready to leave your mark as a champion?
